name: pokedex
description: ### Description Users will be able to navigate through a set list of Pokemon. They will be able to search for a speicifc Pokemon by name or generate a random Pokemon. Users will also be able to navigate to a page that displays a full list of all Pokemone in the database. Once a Pokemon is searched or clicked on, users will be naviaged to a page displaying the Pokemon and attributes. Users will also have the option to sort the Pokemon by type via a dropdown bar and be shown the weaknesses of each.
